winner.name: Electron Desktop
winner.approach: Cross-platform desktop app med Electron + React. Native fildialoger, systemtray-integration, auto-updates.

gamma.reason: Limited visual feedback for complex errors

rationale: User selected Beta following Council recommendation. Prioritizes production stability, maintainability with existing Node/TypeScript expertise over Tauri's smaller bundle size.

previousEvolution.note: Migration tool backend - same timeline won both evolutions
